titleStmt.title: World Wide Diplomatic Archives Index: Colombia
Colombia

div.head: Legislation
div.p: The Ministry of Foreign Affairs library has documents from 1966. These are not open to the public but requests for an exception may be addressed to the Minister of Foreign Affairs. Older material has been transferred to the National Archives and it is available to the public.

div.head: Location
div.p: The Archivo General de la Nación is located in central Bogotá.

div.head: Procedures
div.p: Researchers must request a credential by sending a personal letter, a letter from the representing institution, two photographs and a photocopy of a passport to the National Archive.
